term.title: square-wave current

item.text: In square-wave polarography, the component of the current that is associated with the presence of a substance B. This component may be either faradaic (if B is electroactive) or non-faradaic (if B is surface-active).

sources.item: PAC, 1985, 57, 1491. 'Recommended terms, symbols, and definitions for electroanalytical chemistry (Recommendations 1985)' on page 1499 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198557101491)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
